row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS $agentpath=get-location $path="&UC4RB_REG_KEY#" $reportFile=join-path $agentpath "snapshot\&UC4RB_OUT_TARGET_GUID#\OverviewSnap.xml" $reportFileBOM=join-path $agentpath "snapshot\&UC4RB_OUT_TARGET_GUID#\OverviewSnapBOM.xml" $guid="&UC4RB_OUT_TARGET_GUID#"
$currentDateTime=get-date -format "d/MM/%y HH:%m:%s"
set-location registry::$path
$dirs=,$path + (get-childitem . -rec|select-object -expand name)
$xmlDoc='<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <registrySnapshot date="' + $currentDateTime + '" guid="'+$guid+'" regPath="'+$path+'" type="reg" >'
foreach ($j in $dirs) { set-location registry::$j $keyPath=(get-item . |select-object -expand name) if ( -not $keyPath ) { continue } $loc='<key path="'+$keyPath+'" >' $xmlDoc=$xmlDoc+$loc
$props=(get-item . |select-object -expand property)
foreach ($i in $props) { $value=get-itemproperty . $i |select-object -expand $i $str= '<property name="'+$i+'" value="'+$value+'"/>' $xmlDoc=$xmlDoc+$str } $xmlDoc=$xmlDoc+"</key>"
} $xmlDoc=$xmlDoc+"</registrySnapshot>"
$doc=[xml]$xmlDoc $doc.Save($reportFileBOM) $Utf8NoBomEncoding = New-Object System.Text.UTF8Encoding($False) $w = New-Object System.Xml.XmlTextWriter($reportFile, $Utf8NoBomEncoding) $doc.Save($w) $w.Close() :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_REPORT_FILE#="&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#\snapshot\&UC4RB_OUT_TARGET_GUID#\OverviewSnap.xml"
